public class LineNumberTableAttribute
extends Attribute
This attribute contains a table that maps from PCs to line numbers.

LineNumberTableAttribute(ClassFile, int, DataInputStream)
Build a LineNumberAttribute from a data stream

PCToLine(int)
Given a PC, return the number of the source line containing it.

LineNumberTableAttribute 
 public LineNumberTableAttribute(ClassFile classFile,
                                 int nameIndex,
                                 DataInputStream s) throws ClassFormatError, IOException
Build a LineNumberAttribute from a data stream

Parameters:
classFile - is the ClassFile containing this Attribute
nameIndex - the index of this attribute's name in the constant pool.
s - the DataInputStream to parse

PCToLine 
 public int PCToLine(int pc)
Given a PC, return the number of the source line containing it.
